price: Wͻn a wͻagye adie na wͻdi dwuma pa no, nhyira ne wͻn, na (nhyira ne) bea pa a wͻ’bεsan akͻ no.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ طُوبَىٰ لَهُمۡ وَحُسۡنُ مَـَٔابٖ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti ṭūbā lahum waḥus'nu maābin
